column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Evoking a wondrous garden maze with surprises around every corner
column2: the Art Institute of Chicago is quite simply one of the best museums you'll ever visit -- anywhere in the world. Take the time to savor its treasures
column3: and you'll leave with memories for a lifetime. From classical Greek and Roman statuary to iconic American paintings
column4: there's something here for every taste - a virtual cornucopia of world art that both overwhelms and stimulates a hunger for more.
